text: @ImranKhanPTI AOA. sir i am a university student and living in a private hostel , due to covid-19 hostels bnd kr diye gy hn till may 31 , hostel k owner hm sy pura pura room rent maang rhy hn , kindly sir room rent half liya jy aur iss k liye policy bnai jyy.
